spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object. Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, target takes 1d10 fire damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d10 at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

spells.name: Sacred Flame
spells.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature. Target must succeed on DEX save or take 1d8 radiant damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d8 at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

spells.name: Light
spells.description: Touch one object no larger than 10 feet. It sheds bright light in 20-foot radius.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.description: A spectral hand appears. Use it to manipulate objects, open doors, retrieve items.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: Create three glowing darts. Each dart hits a creature of your choice, dealing 1d4+1 force damage.
spells.higher_levels: One additional dart per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: +5 AC until start of your next turn, including vs triggering attack.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: Creature you touch regains 1d8 + spellcasting modifier HP.
spells.higher_levels: Healing increases by 1d8 per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.description: Creature of your choice that you can see regains 1d4 + spellcasting modifier HP.
spells.higher_levels: Healing increases by 1d4 per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Guiding Bolt
spells.description: Ranged spell attack deals 4d6 radiant. Next attack against target has advantage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d6 per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.description: 15-foot cone of fire. DEX save for half. Creatures take 3d6 fire damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d6 per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.description: Roll 5d8. Creatures in 20-foot radius fall asleep starting from lowest HP.
spells.higher_levels: Roll additional 2d8 per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Hunter's Mark
spells.description: Mark a creature. Deal extra 1d6 damage to it with weapon attacks.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: 20-foot radius explosion. DEX save for half. 8d6 fire damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d6 per slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Spirit Guardians
spells.description: Spirits protect 15-foot radius. WIS save or 3d8 radiant damage.
spells.higher_levels: Damage increases by 1d8 per slot level above 3rd.

spells.name: Revivify
spells.description: Touch creature that died within 1 minute. It returns with 1 HP.
